name: Rain-X 850217 RearView Wiper Blade 11", OEM Replacement Rear Windshield Wiper, Interchangeable Adapter for Easy Installation, All-Weather & All-Season Performance, Beam
short_description: Compatible with Arm Type: Cross Pin, PTB, Trunion, V Notch, I&L
Quick & Easy Installation: Installs in seconds with an interchangeable adapter, no tools needed! Get an OE replacement rear wiper blade that fits perfectly and works right away.
See Clearly, Drive Safer: Improve rear visibility instantly for safer reversing and lane changes, because clear sightlines shouldn’t stop at the front windshield.
Built to Last in Any Season: Natural rubber resists cracking, tearing, and UV damage, while standing up to heat, cold, washer fluid, and road salt for long-lasting performance.
OEM Quality & Reliable Fit: Engineered to meet or exceed original equipment standards, this rear wiper ensures a snug, secure fit for smooth operation and peace of mind.
product_description: Upgrade your rear visibility with the Rain-X RearView Wiper Blade, equipped with an interchangeable adapter for quick and easy installation. Engineered for long-lasting performance, this OE replacement rear wiper blade delivers all-weather reliability and a factory-quality fit. It installs in seconds and is designed to match original equipment standards for a secure, precise connection. The natural rubber squeegee resists cracking, tearing, and wear from heat, cold, washer fluid, and road salt—ensuring clear, streak-free wiping in any season. Whether you're backing out in the rain or navigating through winter slush, the Rain-X RearView Wiper Blade provides the rearview clarity you need to drive with confidence. Don’t stop at your front wipers—refresh your full view and stay safe from every angle with trusted Rain-X quality, durable performance, and everyday value in one easy upgrade.
